title: The Business Of Beats: A Common Sense Guide For Selling Beats
description: The best thing to be in this day and age is an INDIE Producer.WE are the Music Industry. And now we have direct connect with our consumers. with NO greedy little middle men. In the pages of this book, you will find many principles of beat selling, and over 30 tried and true ways you canstart generating more income from your music today.
author: Robert   Anderson
